name: Pet Survivors
description:
This game prototype took inspiration from Vampire Survivor, Neon Abyss , and Cult of the Lamb to create a new game experience that combines the elements we like from these games. 

We wanted to create an experience that lets players enjoy two types of gameplay. One is combat-focused in a separate level, and one is a cozy base building in a hub world with pets you could tame and take care of.

Credits:

Adam Saidane - Programmer & Game Designer

Naya Al Tahan - Level Designer
